item.title: Everything you’ve ever wanted to know about New York City’s restaurant ratings
item.description: What do the food ratings tell us about restaurants and health departments? Every restaurant in NYC receives a letter grade by the city. Using this information we can draw insights into safety and where to eat. Anyone who’s been to New York City likely noticed the restaurant letter grades on virtually all eating establishments. The letter grades were introduced in 2010 and range from A through C, with A being the highest (best) rating.
